document_data.name: Solina al-Ganij
document_data.mainbody: '''Solina al-Ganij''' was a skilled [[Elemental mage|flame mage]] and member of the [[House of Uqab]] tribe in the [[High Desert]] of [[west Zakhara]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p42">
document_data.Personality: Solina was a greedy coward.<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p42"/>
document_data.History: Once a member of the infamous [[Brotherhood of the True Flame]], Solina turned on her brethren during a plot to assassinate the [[Alurah bint Asrah|Sultana]] of [[Hiyal]]. Much to her surprise, the Sultana's men hunted her down as well after she turned on her companions. Solina fled Hiyal and disappeared into the expanse of the High Desert where she was rescued by Sheikh [[Hanjar al-Haqara]].<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p42"/>
